title: Blitzcrank - New Skin Idea
body:
Hey guys.

Just wanted to mention to everyone that the new Avengers movie is coming out soon and if anyone has seen the current trailer, you would have also seen that their is a new, increased sized iron man now in the movie that gives off quite a replica of Blitzcrank. I just thought I'd mention this as I love playing Blitzcrank and I just thought basing that some characters in-game such as Rammus; having the King Rammus title that is also a replica to the Mario Brothers character, Bowser.

So maybe this might be an idea to look into if some people think Blitzcrank could use this skin quite effectively to it's potential.

***Images***
http://medialb.ultimedia.com/multi/3sv8x/3kp5vp-L.jpg
http://cdn.hitfix.com/photos/5838192/iron_article_story_large.jpg
